input: Human rabies is extremely rare, and there have been [MASK] cases in Oregon in the last eight years.
Ruminants have an even number of toes on each foot and a stomach with either three or [MASK] chambers.
Insects have three pairs of legs and [MASK] body segments.
Smoking causes lung cancer in [MASK] ways.
Sharks have a total of [MASK] senses, five of which are involved in locating food.
Oil spills account for only about [MASK] percent of the oil entering the oceans.
Flea larvae metamorphose through [MASK] stages before spinning a cocoon and entering the pupal stage .
